Text.val: // Author: Peter van der Veen; created: 12.07.2001
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
20.11.2008 SH SCR14118 Removed storing of MQ135, now done in BPH255I
10.09.2008 AK SCR13933 change the calculation of last parameter of BPH112
08.08.2007 SH SCR12780 Added tests to turn BPH106 to MSWG in case of
BPH113.PI.PAYMENTCODE = 0 (added after all calls of BPH113) or perform
a rollback if BPH106 is started from online programs
16.12.2005 SH SCR9822 Added part to clear rounding differences, see BPH112
where partial invoice amounts have to be booked if PI.ALLOWED_WKA <> 0 and
CLNT416_WKAHANDLINGTYPE = 3 and INVO_AWKAI <> 0
28.11.2005 SH SCR9605 Extended handling for PI.ALLOWED_WKA, according to
CLNT416_WKAHANDLINGTYPE = 3
12.11.2005 SH SCR9488 Added call to BMQ001 (MQ135) to inform payment department
about payment difference
13.07.2005 SH SCR8473 Added 3 new parameters PI.ALLOWED_WKA,
PI.ALLOWED_CREDITRESTR, PI.NOT_ALLOWED_CREDITRESTR and added calls
to BPH113 for every parameter if <> 0
16.04.2004 SH SCR3627 Extended argument list for BPH112, see SCR for details
19.12.2003 SH SCR5117 Added new argument BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH for call to BPH112
14.04.2003 SH SCR3287 BTCP_STATUS = 1 and
- BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH = BTCH_TOTAPAYMENTSHANDLEDH + BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH
- only will be executed if BTCP_AMOUNTCURRPAYMENT = BTCP_AMOUNTBOOKEDCURRPAY
09.10.2002 SH Changed arguments for BPH113 according to SPECS
17.09.2002 SH Call new version of BPH113 which do not make updates
to BTCP, but send the new calculated values back, which will be stored
in this current program (BPH106) then.
Also a new version of BPH112 will be called now which also not make updates
to the BTCP row, but send the new calculated values back, which will be stored
in this progam.
// One link, which is reestablished for every invoice parameter
-- Fetch last invoice number which has to be booked, because possible rounding
differences have to be cleared, if last invoice is booked with BPH112
invoiceno 1
invoiceno 2
invoiceno 3
invoiceno 4
invoiceno 5
invoiceno 6
invoiceno 7
invoiceno 8
invoiceno 9
invoiceno 10
// store BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE rows for the differences
// Different handling for payment schedule payments:
// Handled
-- BPH106 is called from online program as synchron job
-- BPH106 is called from batch program (submitted job on i5)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Database updates will be rolled back, try again ...')
